Articles.Content:
(So, I was playing KSP and noticed that I did not have room for two boosters.. I decided to go with one, but I did not know the results would be so funny!)

Need I say more? What do you think? ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

[http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2rpraa_ksp-rocket-surfing_videogames](https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2rpraa_ksp-rocket-surfing_videogames)

Lol, that actually worked out better than I expected it to. It's not like kerbals care about things like CoM and CoT anyway ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Some rockets actually fly with a single SRB ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Really, Hcube? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) This one did not, unfortunately for little Stayputnik! 

Haha, very true, LittleBlueGaming. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Really, Hcube? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) This one did not, unfortunately for little Stayputnik! 
> Haha, very true, LittleBlueGaming. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Yeah the Atlas 5 sometimes does that ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

i tried but my attempts were just like yours, difference being that they didnt surf (yes it means that they crashed miserably). ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Ooh, harsh. And true. I got quite a laugh from this one!

In the season premiere of Myth busters on the Discovery Channel, the showÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s team puts to the test a myth about a rocket-powered surfboard. Tory Belleci, Grant Imahara, Kari Byron, and their mannequin named Buster strap a haul of explosives on the back of a longboard, essentially just to see what happens.

Read more at [http://www.surfermag.com/features/rocket-powered-surfboards/#P8mLf9zM8ppeLE3C.99](http://www.surfermag.com/features/rocket-powered-surfboards/#P8mLf9zM8ppeLE3C.99)
